TopicTitle: Looking for a 3D modeller for simple stuff

Articles.Content:
I've been trying to contact few people since late spring in regards to making a very simple one part mod (for now) but it seems that won't work and I don't want the idea to go to waste.

Basically I need someone who can make a 3D model when provided with a blueprint. Nothing insane, just very simple shapes. I'm not into pulling my hair learning how to work with Blender just to make simple stuff and I don't have issues with crediting people for their work.

 

If anyone is interested, please send me a message in inbox.

Hey, I'd be happy to do some modeling for you. I don't have experience with Blender, but I do know SolidWorks reasonably well and have access to a licence. I don't know what format you need though? STEP? 

 

Edit: New member so can't send PMs, but long time KSP player who'd love to contribute to its great modding community.

Edited December 23, 2017 by Baffage
